short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Will display the rotten tomatoes score of a movies presented on the Cineplex.com website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome Extension loads the Rotten Tomatoes "Tomato Score" and injects it into the movie title on various Cineplex movie listing pages to help you pick a movie screening and avoid "rotten" movies. 

From navigating through various parts of the Cineplex.com website, I have found the pages that list titles of movies and added support for them.  Below are some examples:

- https://www.cineplex.com/Showtimes/any-movie/nearby-theatres?Date=12/29/2019
- https://www.cineplex.com/
- https://www.cineplex.com/Theatre/scotiabank-theatre-toronto
- https://www.cineplex.com/Movies/NowPlaying?cmpid=MainSubNavEN_now-playing
- https://www.cineplex.com/Theatres/UltraAVX
